content.rendered:
[vc_row center_row=”yes”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”10426″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Your restaurant’s lifeblood is its kitchen equipment. Any malfunctioning appliance might bring calamity. Maintaining your equipment properly is one of the best methods to avoid this from happening. Periodic maintenance not only saves you money in the long term, but it also ensures that your warranty is valid and that your kitchen equipment is functioning at peak efficiency. Improper installation and lack of maintenance are the two most typical reasons for warranties being void. Altawafa Services can assist you with Kitchen Maintenance Services and Sanitary Installation & Pipes Repairing. The major brands of commercial kitchen equipment are serviced by Altawafa. Which is factory authorised. Our specialists are manufacturer trained in appliance and refrigeration maintenance. We also provide Wallpaer Fixing Works.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

Kitchen Maintenance Services:

Altawafa is pleased to offer one of the industry’s most comprehensive preventive maintenance plans. When you contact us for routine maintenance, you can rest assured that your kitchen equipment will be inspected and cared for on a regular basis. It’s easy to become overwhelmed by the prospect of running a kitchen, especially if your machines stop working. From broken dishwashers to heated refrigerators, we offer the knowledge and experience you need. Maintaining the efficiency of your kitchen is critical to the success of any catering business. If your dishwashing machine breaks, your employees will spend more time cleaning flatware and silverware and less time on other tasks.

To help you relax, Altawafa offers commercial kitchen hardware repair in the UAE. Professionals work quickly and efficiently to diagnose and resolve any issues you may be having with your culinary equipment. We recognise the importance of keeping your machines running at peak efficiency so you can focus on providing delicious food to your customers. We can assist you whether you run a small eatery or a large eating lobby that can feed hundreds at a time. We provide a wide range of commercial kitchen maintenance and repair services in the UAE.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1618470929551{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1618474274532{margin-top: -20px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Bicko Paints, Polish, Kitchen Tile Fixing

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”10583″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”10584″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
